item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260109)
item.description:
What's New

Refactor: Merge focus timer with injection detection

  • Consolidate toolbar focus timer and injection detection into single timer
  • Add handleFocusCheck() to get focused element once and pass to processors
  • Add checkIntraAppFocusChange() for detecting focus changes within same app
  • Add getElementSignature() to create element signature (role+subrole+description)
  • Reduce timer interval from 0.5s to 0.3s for better responsiveness
  • Keep focus timer running when toolbar is disabled (for injection detection)
  • Update build version to 20260109
